onlineNotepad.title: Online Notepad - Free Web-Based Text Editor
onlineNotepad.description: A simple and efficient online notepad for taking notes, editing text, and creating documents. Features auto-save, download options, and mobile-optimized interface.
onlineNotepad.uploadDescription: Upload a text file to edit in the notepad
onlineNotepad.newFileDescription: Are you sure you want to create a new file? Any unsaved changes will be lost.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Complete list of keyboard shortcuts available in the Online Notepad
keyboardShortcuts.tip: üí° Tip: Use these shortcuts to work more efficiently with your documents.

about.title: About Online Notepad
about.description: A modern, feature-rich text editor for all your note-taking needs

features.richText: Rich text editing with formatting options

footer.builtWith: Built with modern web technologies for the best user experience.

findReplace.title: Find and Replace
findReplace.description: Search and replace text in your document

asciiArtGenerator.title: ASCII Art Generator - Text & Image to ASCII Art Converter
asciiArtGenerator.description: Create stunning ASCII art from text and images. Convert your text into decorative ASCII fonts or transform images into beautiful ASCII art with customizable options.

modeSelector.title: Choose Generation Mode
modeSelector.description: Select whether you want to convert text or images into ASCII art

modes.textDescription: Convert text into decorative ASCII art fonts
modes.imageDescription: Transform images into ASCII character art

imagePanel.uploadDescription: Upload an image to convert to ASCII art
imagePanel.dragDropLabel: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select
imagePanel.supportedFormats: Supported: JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP (max 10MB)

output.label: ASCII Art Output
output.placeholder: Your ASCII art will appear here...

errors.invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload an image file.
errors.fileTooLarge: File too large. Please upload an image smaller than 10MB.
errors.processingFailed: Failed to process image. Please try again.
errors.emptyText: Please enter some text to convert.
errors.loadingFailed: Failed to load image. Please try a different file.

natoPhonetic.title: NATO Phonetic Alphabet Converter
natoPhonetic.description: Convert text to NATO phonetic alphabet and vice versa. Perfect for clear communication in military, aviation, and professional settings.
natoPhonetic.inputPlaceholder: Type your text here or enter NATO phonetic words...
natoPhonetic.uploadDescription: Upload a text file to convert (.txt, .md, .js, .ts, .jsx, .tsx, .json, .css, .html)

messages.noTextProvided: Please enter some text to convert.
messages.invalidPhoneticText: Text doesn't appear to be valid NATO phonetic format.

romanNumeralDate.title: Roman Numeral Date Converter
romanNumeralDate.description: Convert modern dates to Roman numeral format and vice versa. Perfect for historical documents, wedding invitations, monuments, and classical design projects.
romanNumeralDate.inputPlaceholder: Enter a modern date (2024-12-25) or Roman date (XXV DECEMBER MMXXIV)...
romanNumeralDate.uploadDescription: Upload a text file containing dates to convert

formats.medieval: Medieval (XIX DIE APRILIS ANNO DOMINI MMXXIV)

examples.title: Historical Date Examples
examples.description: Click any example to use it as input

help.conversionMode: Choose how to convert dates: auto-detect, modern to Roman, or Roman to modern
help.outputFormat: Select the Roman numeral date format style for output
help.quickInput: Use the date picker or buttons for quick date selection

errors.noInput: Please enter a date to convert
errors.invalidDate: Invalid date format. Please use YYYY-MM-DD, MM/DD/YYYY, or DD/MM/YYYY
errors.invalidRomanDate: Invalid Roman date format. Please check the input
errors.dateOutOfRange: Date must be between year 1 and 3999 CE
errors.conversionFailed: Conversion failed. Please check your input format

placeholders.romanInput: Enter Roman date (e.g., XXII SEPTEMBER MMXXV)
placeholders.selectDate: Select a date to see Roman numeral format

md5Hash.title: MD5 Hash Generator - Secure Text & File Hash Calculator
md5Hash.description: Generate MD5 hash checksums for text and files instantly. Professional MD5 hash calculator with multiple output formats and real-time hash generation.
md5Hash.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to generate MD5 hash...
md5Hash.outputPlaceholder: Your MD5 hash will appear here
md5Hash.uploadDescription: Upload a text file to generate its MD5 hash

sha1Hash.title: SHA-1 Hash Generator
sha1Hash.description: Generate SHA-1 hash checksums for text and files instantly. 40-character hexadecimal hash output with multiple formats and real-time generation.
sha1Hash.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to generate SHA-1 hash...
sha1Hash.outputPlaceholder: Your SHA-1 hash will appear here
sha1Hash.uploadDescription: Upload a text file to generate its SHA-1 hash

securityWarning.title: Security Notice
securityWarning.message: SHA-1 is no longer recommended for modern cryptographic security. For secure applications, use SHA-256 or SHA-512 instead.

utmBuilder.title: UTM Parameter Builder - Track Marketing Campaigns
utmBuilder.description: Build UTM parameters for Google Analytics campaign tracking. Generate trackable URLs with source, medium, campaign, term, and content parameters for accurate marketing attribution.
utmBuilder.generateFirst: Please generate a UTM URL first
utmBuilder.noUrlGenerated: Enter your base URL and UTM parameters to generate a trackable URL that will appear here.

analytics.title: UTM Analytics
analytics.practiceOne: Use lowercase letters and underscores instead of spaces
analytics.practiceTwo: Keep parameter values descriptive but concise
analytics.practiceThree: Use consistent naming conventions across campaigns
analytics.enterParameters: Enter UTM parameters to see analytics
analytics.mustUseHttp: URL must use HTTP or HTTPS
